name: Lush Rush
description:
Battle the corruption that has polluted the once-green valleys of Lush Rush. Grow plants where you run, collect crystals to demolish spikes, and bash Goo monsters to bits! Rush to restore the ecosystem! Controls (you can remap though) 'A' and 'D'Move Left And Right'W'Jump'W' (Midair)Double Jump'Shift'Dash'Escape' or 'P'Settings Menu Settings (we have a lot)
  • Volume Settings
  • Control Remapping
  • Screen Settings
  • Difficulty Settings
Credits

Bix Men: Code + Design + Art
Tucker Hux Murray: Music + Sounds

Created for the Mini Jam "control the environment" jam.
